description.short: Represents information about a sound device on the system.

methods.name: deviceID
methods.short: The device's unique ID (to be used in ofSoundStream::setDeviceID() )

methods.name: inputChannels
methods.short: Number of input channels the device supports

methods.name: isDefaultInput
methods.short: If true, this device will be used by ofSoundStream unless changed with setDeviceID()

methods.name: isDefaultOutput
methods.short: If true, this device will be used by ofSoundStream unless changed with setDeviceID()

methods.name: name
methods.short: Descriptive name for the device This is the same string that ofSoundStream::getMatchingDevices() will be looking for

methods.name: outputChannels
methods.short: Number of output channels the device supports
List of sample rates the device claims to support
